channel.title: Access Your Cluster on
channel.description: Recent content in Access Your Cluster on

item.title: Log In and Access Clusters
item.description:
This section explains how to log in to the KubeSphere web console and access a cluster.

Prerequisites

  • You should have the username and password of a cluster member.

  • Contact the administrator to obtain the IP address and port number of the KubeSphere web console.

  • Depending on your network environment, you may need to configure firewall and traffic forwarding rules. For specific instructions, please contact your network administrator.

Steps

  1. Open a web browser and enter the IP address and port number of the KubeSphere web console in the address bar, such as 172.31.85.22:30880.

  2. On the login page, enter your username and password and click Log In.

  3. Click Cluster Management.

  4. Click the name of a cluster in the Cluster Management page to access the cluster.
